name: Bucknook
overview:
Bucknook is a startup that is building a highly scalable system to offer image search as an easy to use service to developers.

Currently image search – like Google Goggles and Amazon Flow – is a technology that only a few companies possess. We are passionate about getting this technology in the hands of every developer. We believe that this will enable developers to add value to their existing applications and also come up with very new kinds of applications.

The applications for this technology are numerous. From commercial ones like shopping, fashion, photo sharing to non commercial ones like flower and butterfly classifiers – your imagination is the limit.

The service will be offered for free to casual developers.
